boardgame.name: Warhammer Battle
Warhammer Fantasy Battle
Warhammer Jeu des Batailles Fantastiques
Warhammer: El juego de batallas fantasticas
Warhammer: The Mass Combat Fantasy Roleplaying Game (1st Edition)
boardgame.description: Warhammer is the complete game system for fantasy adventuring and warfaring. Within the three volumes of this set, you will find all the information needed to play out fantastic battles and adventures using miniature figures and dice. Suitable whether you are a handful of adventurers facing unknown perils, or a great general leading your huge army into battle against hordes of evil monsters._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Warhammer rules feature sections on:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; I am selling a number of Dark Elf miniatures, some painted to a good tabletop standard, most unpainted. Listed price and shipping costs is for the whole lot, and is negotiable. I am willing to sell separate parts as well, contact me to negotiate prices and shipping costs. 6 Shades (3 painted) 9 Witch Elves (3 painted) 1 Assassin (painted) 1 Sorceress on horse (painted) 1 General/lord on a Cold one (painted) 1 Repeater bolt thrower and crew (painted, bolt thrower legs need regluing) 15 Corsairs (10 painted, including command group, 5 primed and paint job started) 1 War hydra and 2 Beastmasters (painted, two heads need regluing) 6 Dark Riders (4 painted, 2 primed including musician) 1 Sorceress on foot (unpainted) 1 War chariot (partially painted and assembled, half a spear and a Cold One missing) 10 Cold One Knights (unpainted, unassembled, including command group) 1 Witch King on Dragon (metal mini needs paint stripping, feet of dragon needs gluing) 17 Executioners (unpainted, unassembled, including command group) 5 Executioners missing sword blades About 40 Dark elf warriors (5 painted and assembled as crossbowmen with shields, 11 on sprue, the rest partially assembled, and in bits and pieces. Some bases missing.) 2 Harpies

This is the sixth edition boxed starter set. All figures remain on spures and game pieces are unplayed. The rule book is soft cover and has a crease is the binding but it structurally fine. The box has some warping and a small tear on the base box(unfortunately it came that way new). Despite the small tear the box is still structurally sound. Shipping is $13.95 US

5th edition boxed set. Been sitting on a shelf for a long time, never played. All the minis (Brettonians and Saurons) are at least primed, some have been assembled and some have been completely painted. Really I just want to make room for something else and this is not gonna get played. Please give it a good home.

Shrinkwrap removed but never played. Many of the miniatures are still attached to their plastic sprues. The 3-D buildings are unpunched. This is the English Sixth Edition boxed set from 2000. Missing the Rulebook but easily available on-line for around $15USD or downloadable. I store my games in a pet-free and smoke-free environment and I package my games for shipment with the utmost care. I ship quickly - within 24 hours of receiving payment. I have many hundreds of games for sale and would be happy to combine shipping charges for multiple games to save you money. Shipping weight is 6 pounds.
*Box of Chaos Knights, reserved for gManJoe*
